samples.instruction: Pudhiya driving license eppadi peruvadhu?
samples.current_output: 1. parivahan.gov.in la slot book pannunga 2. First Learner's License (LLR) vaangunga: Age: Two-wheeler 18+, Car 18+ (gear), Commercial 20+. Aadhaar, address proof, medical certificate vendum. Fee: â‚¹200-500 3. 30 days kazhichu DL test ezhudhunga

samples.instruction: Nagarathula Restaurant thodanga ennenna license vendum?
samples.current_output:
**Restaurant Licenses Required:**

**Must Have:**
1. **FSSAI License** - fssai.gov.in, â‚¹100-7,500/year
2. **Trade License** - Corporation, â‚¹2,000-25,000
3. **Shop & Establishment** - tnlabour.tn.gov.in
4. **Fire Safety NOC** - Fire Dept (50+ seating)
5. **GST** - If turnover â‚¹20L+
6. **Health License** - Corporation

**Optional:**
7. Liquor License - TASMAC
8. Signage License - Corporation
9. Music License - Police
10. Pollution NOC - TNPCB

**Staff:** PF (20+ employees), ESI (10+ employees)

**Timeline:** 2-3 months total

**Warning:** Heavy fines for non-compliance!

samples.instruction: Driving License apply pannanum - LLR to DL full process?
samples.current_output:
Step 1 - Learner's License (LLR):

Apply Online:
1. parivahan.gov.in â†’ 'Online Services' â†’ Tamil Nadu
2. 'Apply for Learner's License'
3. Fill Form 1 (Application)
4. Fill Form 2 (Medical - self declaration)
5. Upload: Age proof, Address proof, Photo, Signature
6. Pay: â‚¹200-350

Age Requirements: Scooty (no gear) 16, Bike/Car 18, Transport 20

Book Slot: Select RTO, Choose date, Go for test

LLR Test: Computer-based, 15 questions on road signs/rules, Pass: 9/15, Result: Same day, Valid: 6 months

Step 2 - Driving Test for DL:

Wait Period: 30 days after LLR

Book DL Slot:
1. parivahan.gov.in â†’ 'Apply for Driving License'
2. Enter LLR number
3. Fill Form 4
4. Pay: â‚¹500-700
5. Book slot

Test Day:
- Bring own vehicle (or rent near RTO)
- Documents: LLR, Aadhaar, Photos
- Tests: 8 formation (parking/reverse), Slope driving, Traffic signals, Road driving

Pass: Biometric capture â†’ DL number â†’ Card mailed
Fail: Re-test after 7 days + additional fee

Timeline: LLR same day, DL test after 30 days, DL card 7-15 days after test

samples.instruction: TN Helpline Numbers enna enna?
samples.current_output: Important TN Helplines: 1967 (Ration complaints), 1077 (CM Helpline), 108 (Emergency Ambulance), 104 (Health Helpline), 100 (Police), 101 (Fire), 1091 (Women Helpline), 1098 (Child Helpline - Childline), 181 (Women Helpline - central), 1912 (Anti-Corruption), 155300 (Cyber Crime), 14461 (Kisan Call Centre), 1800-180-1111 (Pensioners). Free: Most are toll-free 24x7.

samples.instruction: EC enga peruvadhu?
samples.current_output: Online at tnreginet.gov.in (records from 1987 onwards) - instant download. Offline at Sub-Registrar Office - 3-5 days. Fee: â‚¹15 per year. Essential for property verification - shows if property has any legal dues or mortgages.

samples.instruction: TN Differently Abled pension/assistance enna?
samples.current_output: TN benefits for differently abled. Pension: â‚¹1,500/month (40%+ disability). Aids: Free wheelchair, hearing aid, artificial limbs, crutches. Education: Free education + special hostels. Employment: 4% reservation in govt jobs. Bus: Free travel (ordinary buses). Loan: Subsidy loan for self-employment. UDID Card: Unique Disability ID - mandatory for all benefits. Apply: Social Welfare dept/Taluk office.

samples.instruction: à®ªà¯à®¤à®¿à®¯ PAN Card à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ à®ªà¯†à®±à¯à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Easiest: Instant e-PAN at eportal.incometax.gov.in using Aadhaar - FREE and instant! Alternative: Apply at onlineservices.nsdl.com or pan.utiitsl.com - â‚¹107 for physical card, 15-20 days. Need ID proof, address proof, DOB proof, photo, and signature.

samples.instruction: Patta maatram eppadi seyvadhu?
samples.current_output: After property registration at SRO, apply for Patta transfer at Taluk Office or eservices.tn.gov.in. Documents: Registered document, EC, ID proof, tax receipts. Field inspection by VAO/RI. Time: 30-45 days. Essential for proving ownership.

samples.instruction: Soil Health Card endraal enna? Eppadi peruvadhu?
samples.current_output: To know soil nutrient status. Card Info: N, P, K levels, pH value, micro nutrients, organic carbon. Testing: Once in 3 years (Govt-free). Benefit: Use right fertilizers, reduce cost, increase yield. Get it: Village Agriculture Officer/Krishi Vigyan Kendra. Check status: soilhealth.dac.gov.in. Sample collection: Agriculture officer collects soil from field.

samples.instruction: SC/ST/BC Scholarship TN-la enna ulladhu?
samples.current_output: Community-wise Scholarships. SC Students: Post-matric scholarship (â‚¹550-1,200/month), Free education (all levels), Hostel stipend. ST Students: Similar to SC + extra coaching. BC/MBC/DNC: Post-matric (â‚¹300-700/month), higher for MBC within BC. Apply: bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in (BC), adwb.tn.gov.in (SC/ST). Documents: Community certificate, Income certificate, Institution bonafide, Aadhaar. Hostel: Free accommodation + food in govt hostels.

samples.instruction: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) endraal enna?
samples.current_output: Crop insurance scheme for farmers. Premium: Kharif 2%, Rabi 1.5%, Commercial crops 5% only - rest paid by Government. Coverage: Natural calamities, pest attack, disease, post-harvest 14 days. Apply: Bank/CSC/Insurance Portal. Documents: Land records, Aadhaar, Bank details. Claim: Report loss within 72 hours. Loss calculated through Crop Cutting Experiments.

samples.instruction: IGNOAPS (Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme) endraal enna?
samples.current_output: Monthly pension for BPL senior citizens. Central: â‚¹200/month (60-79 years), â‚¹500/month (80+ years). TN State: Additional â‚¹1,000/month. Total in TN: â‚¹1,200-1,500/month. Eligibility: 60+ years, BPL family. Apply: Village Panchayat/Taluk office. Documents: Age proof, Aadhaar, BPL card/Income certificate, Bank account. Payment: DBT through bank account.

samples.current_output: Apply at tneservices.tn.gov.in or Taluk Office. Documents: Aadhaar, ration card, self-declaration of income, salary slip (if employed). VAO enquiry at home possible. Time: 7-15 days. Fee: â‚¹20. Valid for 6 months to 1 year.

samples.instruction: Birth certificate eppadi peruvadhu?
samples.current_output: Register within 21 days at hospital location's Municipality/Panchayat - FREE! After 21 days: â‚¹50 late fee + affidavit. Documents: Hospital discharge summary, parents' Aadhaar. Online at tnreginet.gov.in or crsorgi.gov.in. Certificate in 3-5 days.

samples.instruction: PM Vidya Lakshmi Portal endraal enna?
samples.current_output: Education loan portal. Website: vidyalakshmi.co.in. Features: 40+ Banks, 125+ loan schemes, Apply to multiple banks with one application, Scholarship info available. Loan types: Up to â‚¹4 lakh - No collateral, â‚¹4-7.5 lakh - Co-borrower needed, Above â‚¹7.5 lakh - Collateral needed. Interest Subsidy: Govt pays interest during moratorium for EWS students

samples.instruction: Jan Aushadhi-à®²à¯ à®®à®°à¯à®¨à¯à®¤à¯ à®à®©à¯ à®®à®²à®¿à®µà¯?
samples.current_output: Jan Aushadhi sells generic medicines with same quality as branded (WHO-GMP certified) at 50-90% lower price. No brand premium. Find stores at janaushadhi.gov.in. Example: Metformin 500mg - Market â‚¹25, Jan Aushadhi â‚¹3.50. Great for long-term medications.

samples.instruction: Pudhiya kadaikku Commercial Electricity Connection eppadi vaanguvadhu?
samples.current_output:
**Commercial Electricity Connection:**

**Step 1:** Apply at nsc.tnebnet.org

**Step 2: Documents**
- Ownership: Sale Deed/Rent Agreement
- Aadhaar + PAN
- Trade License/GST
- Building Certificate

**Step 3:** Calculate load (AC, Fridge, etc.)

**Step 4:** TANGEDCO inspection

**Step 5: Payment**
- Deposit: â‚¹1,500-15,000
- Service: â‚¹500-2,000
- Meter: â‚¹1,000-3,000

**Step 6:** Connection in 7-15 days

**Commercial Tariff:** Higher than domestic, slab based

**Complaint:** 94987-94987, TANGEDCO App

samples.current_output: Download e-Aadhaar from eaadhaar.uidai.gov.in using Aadhaar number or Enrollment ID + OTP. It's FREE and legally valid. For PVC card, order at uidai.gov.in for â‚¹50. If forgot Aadhaar number, retrieve at myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in â†’ Retrieve Lost UID.

samples.instruction: Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Benefit Scheme endraal enna?
samples.current_output: â‚¹18,000 assistance for pregnant women. 3 installments: â‚¹6,000 (at 12 weeks), â‚¹6,000 (at delivery), â‚¹6,000 (baby 9 months vaccines). Eligibility: 1 year TN resident, delivery at govt/govt-aided hospital. Amma Baby Kit: Additional â‚¹5,000 worth baby care items. Apply: PHC/Govt hospital/ICDS. Documents: Aadhaar, MCP card, Bank account.
